column4: Hai all !! I changed my mouse icon theme , after that my new  theme only works with my web browser !
Hai all !! I changed my mouse icon theme , after that my new  theme only works with my web browser !
what happens when you change it back?
I is showing the default white theme
what happens when you change it back?
when I change it back it shows the default white mouse theme
no the new theme only shows when I use firefox or any text area or any link etc
and what do you mean by "new theme?"
I installed a new mouse theme via software center.
then you didn't answer my question about whether switching back works or not.
what happens when you change it back?
when I change it back it is not changing to default one my default theme is adwaita black theme but the mouse uses the white theme and when I use firefox it is changing to black theme
the main problem is my mouse theme is not changing completely
is there any other channel specified for themes ?
